articles.title: LATAM POLITICS TODAY-El Salvador bitcoin assets slide amid crypto crash
articles.description: They are now worth around $51 million. On Monday, Finance Minister Alejandro Zelaya said the fiscal risk for the country was "extremely minimal." Mystery flight of Iranians, Venezuelans stirs suspicions in Argentina BUENOS AIRES - The arrival last week of an Iran-linked Venezuelan Boeing 747 cargo plane in Buenos Aires is at the center of an unfolding drama with tense geopolitical undercurrents.
articles.content:
The latest in Latin American politics today:

articles.title: Declassified files reveal British interest in Falkland Islands oil
articles.description: Ministers keen to claim UK right to potential deposits before and after 1982 war with Argentina
articles.content:
British ministers were keen to exploit oil around the Falkland Islands before and after the 1982 conflict, declassified British government documents show.
In a previously unpublished letter, the former chancellor Norman Lamont said the revenues from ... [4222 chars]

articles.title: Canadian U-18 women's basketball team overpowers Mexico at Americas Championship
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Argentina — Canada's under-18 women's basketball team tipped off the FIBA Americas Championship on Monday with a dominant 68-40 victory against Mexico.
articles.content:
BUENOS AIRES, Argentina — Canada's under-18 women's basketball team tipped off the FIBA Americas Championship on Monday with a dominant 68-40 victory against Mexico.
T'yana Todd paced Canada's attack with 16 points, including 14 in the first half as ... [1626 chars]
